StatisticsPage.headline: Statistics
StatisticsPage.description: This dashboard offers a clear overview of user sentiment trends, highlighting mood shifts over time, key emotional themes, and the balance between positive and negative feedback.

sentimentOverTime.title: Sentiment Over Time
sentimentOverTime.description: Shows how average sentiment scores change over time

moodDistribution.title: Mood Distribution
moodDistribution.description: Compares the frequency of each mood category

positiveNegativeRatio.title: Positive vs. Negative
positiveNegativeRatio.description: Displays the proportion of positive versus negative entries
